pr_title: [JBPM-9410] No Model definition in KIE Server Swagger API

timeline.message:

Moving response to ApiResponse

timeline.bodyHTML:
There is a small typo in all messages. I will leave it up to you to decide if you wanna change it, if not, it's absolutely ok. no problem.

Suggested change
@ApiResponse(code = 200, response = ProcessDefinition.class, message = "Successfull response", examples=@Example(value= {

timeline.body: For consistency, maybe we can use this PR to include a 200 response code for this method.
